name: Perfect Fill - Paint Of Slices
description:
Perfect Fill - Paint Of Slices! A wonderful game where you try to fill as large areas as possible with the same color.

Challenge people around the world! Play for free and enjoy the sweetness of miraculous blocks!

TARGET
• Fill the grid with color boxes and try to get maximum points!

FILL SCORING
• Single block worth is 10 points.
• The value of a two blocks is 30 points.
• The value of a three blocks is 60 points.
• Four blocks is 100 points, etc...

BONUS
• Time bonus

GAMETIME
• Maximum game time is three minutes.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, real or virtual prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

If you have any questions or proposals to the game, we hope you contact us at support@ccbrothers.com
